#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline long long getn(){
	int n=0,c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c< '0'||c>'9')c= getchar_unlocked();
	while(c>='0'&& c<='9')
		n = (n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c= getchar_unlocked();
	return n;
}
int main()
{
 long long test,n;
 long long sum_even,sum_odd,sum;
 test=getn();
 while(test--)
 {
     n=getn();
     printf("%lld\n",(n>>1)*((n+1)>>1));
 }
}
